# NSColorList

**Class**

An ordered list of color objects, identified by keys.

## Declaration

```swift
class NSColorList
```

## Overview

A color list manages a list of [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSColor] objects, each of which has an associated name. The [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSColorPanel] list mode color picker uses instances of [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSColorList] to represent any lists of colors that come with the system, as well as any lists the user creates. An app can use a color list to manage document-specific color lists.

## Creating Lists of Colors

- **init(name:)**: Initializes and returns a color list, registering it under the specified name if it isn’t in use already.
- **init(name:fromFile:)**: Initializes and returns a color list from the specified file, registering it under the specified name if it isn’t in use already.

## Getting Lists of Colors

- **availableColorLists**: Returns an array of all color lists found in the standard color list directories.
- **init(named:)**: Searches the available color lists array and returns the color list with the specified name.

## Getting Information About Lists of Colors

- **name**: The name of the color list.
- **NSColorList.Name**: The name assigned to a color list.
- **isEditable**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the color list can be modified.

## Managing Colors By Key

- **allKeys**: An array of the keys by which the color objects are stored in the color list.
- **color(withKey:)**: Returns the color object associated with the specified key.
- **insertColor(_:key:at:)**: Inserts the specified color at the specified location in the color list.
- **removeColor(withKey:)**: Removes the color associated with the specified key from the color list.
- **setColor(_:forKey:)**: Associates the specified color object with the specified key.

## Writing and Removing Color List Files

- **write(to:)**: Saves the color list to the file at the specified URL.
- **removeFile()**: Removes the file from which the list was created, if the file is in a standard search path and owned by the user.
- **write(toFile:)**: Saves the color list to the file at the specified path.

## Notifications

- **didChangeNotification**: Posted whenever a color list changes.

## Colors

- **NSColor**: An object that stores color data and sometimes opacity (alpha value).
- **NSColorSpace**: An object that represents a custom color space.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
